ReLTER: An interface to the eLTER for the R statistical programming environment - v1.0.0

Alessadro Oggioni (alessandro.oggioni@cnr.it), Micha Silver (silverm@post.bgu.ac.il), Luigi Ranghetti (ranghetti.l@irea.cnr.it), Paolo Tagliolato (tagliolato.a@irea.cnr.it)

2022-03-03

Source: vignettes/ReLTER.Rmd
ReLTER.Rmd

ReLTER provides access to DEIMS-SDR, and allows interaction with data and software implemented by Long Term Ecological Research Research Infrastructure (eLTER-RI) thus improving data sharing among European LTER projects.






Documentation of ReLTER

Visit the ReLTER website for further documentation, examples, and installation of the package.

Installation of ReLTER

You can install the development version of ReLTER from GitHub with:

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("oggioniale/ReLTER")

If you wish to help develop this package, please follow the contributing guidelines.

Problems and Issues of ReLTER

Please report any issues you may encounter in our issues page on GitHub

Citation of ReLTER

To cite ReLTER please use: Alessandro Oggioni, Micha Silver, Luigi Ranghetti & Paolo Tagliolato. (2021). oggioniale/ReLTER: ReLTER v1.0.0 (1.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5576813

Code of Conduct of ReLTER

Please note that this package is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
